type.description:
## Grounded

---


[Entity Condition Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/grounded).

Checks whether the entity is currently on the ground.

Type ID: `apugli:grounded`

---

### Example
```json
"condition": {
    "type": "apugli:grounded"
}
```
